resourceClassifiedAs.description: A #ResourceClassification that defines the type of this resource

underlyingResource.description: A more concrete #EconomicResource upon which this resource is based.

trackingIdentifier.description: Something like a batch or serial number

owner.description: The #Agent that can use, trade, sell, or share this Resource
owner.$comment: This is a stand-in until custodianship is defined in ValueFlows
